bonus.value: While Frost Resonance is activated: For every 3 seconds, deal damage equal to 60%/100%/150%/220% of frost ATK to enemies in a 10-meter radius and inflict the Frost effect. Frost effect: Slow the target by 3.5% for 5 seconds, and freeze the target for 3 seconds upon reaching 3 stacks, but unable to freeze the boss. Increase the frost damage the target received by 5%. Last for 18 seconds. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

Attack the target 10 times to inflict a 12-second Flashfreeze mark. Flashfreeze: Increase frost damage dealt to the marked target by 11%/28%/31%/34%. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

emotion.name: In Control
emotion.desc: An action that feels like everything is under control.
